original_text: Simon had used his magic for a long time and he had surprised them all very much. Because of that, they listened to him carefully.
korean_text: 오랫동안 그 마술에 놀랐으므로 그들이 따르더니

sentences.original_text: Simon had used his magic for a long time
and he had surprised them all very much
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 모두를 크게 놀라게 했습니다
그들은 그의 말을 주의 깊게 들었습니다
